DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to determine whether dual treatment with metformin and alogliptin is more effective than treatment with metformin, alogliptin and pioglitazone in the treatment of obese women with polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) regarding insulin resistance and beta cell function.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Alogliptin Versus Alogliptin and Pioglitazone on Insulin Resistance of Metformin Treated Women With PCOS
